typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PRODUCTID as string,
		PRODUCTNDC as string,
		NDCPACKAGECODE as string,
		PACKAGEDESCRIPTION as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 10,
	wildcardPaths:['Drug_sub.txt']) ~> source1
source1 derive(PRODUCTID = concat(PRODUCTID ,"_Trans"),
		PRODUCTNDC = concat(PRODUCTNDC,"_Trans"),
		NDCPACKAGECODE = concat(NDCPACKAGECODE,"_Trans"),
		PACKAGEDESCRIPTION = concat(PACKAGEDESCRIPTION,"_Trans")) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 split(like(PRODUCTID, "0002-14%"),
	disjoint: false) ~> Stream1@(filter1, filter2)
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		PRODUCTID as string,
		PRODUCTNDC as string,
		NDCPACKAGECODE as string,
		PACKAGEDESCRIPTION as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	mapColumn(
		PRODUCTID,
		PRODUCTNDC,
		NDCPACKAGECODE,
		PACKAGEDESCRIPTION
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
Stream1@filter1 sink(input(
		PRODUCTID as string,
		PRODUCTNDC as string,
		NDCPACKAGECODE as string,
		PACKAGEDESCRIPTION as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		PRODUCTID,
		PRODUCTNDC,
		NDCPACKAGECODE,
		PACKAGEDESCRIPTION
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
Stream1@filter2 sink(input(
		PRODUCTID as string,
		PRODUCTNDC as string,
		NDCPACKAGECODE as string,
		PACKAGEDESCRIPTION as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink3
